name: Muglai Veggie Biryani
description: A super delicious Mughlai Veggie Biryani packed full of flavor with delicious herbs, spices and veggies. This recipe is great for dinner or entertaining. Vegan Gluten Free Recipe.
recipeIngredient: 6-8  raw cashews ((you can use roasted or fried as well))

recipeInstructions.text: Cook the rice and keep aside.
recipeInstructions.name: Cook the rice and keep aside.

recipeInstructions.text: In a large pan, heat the oil at medium heat and add all the whole spices(cumin seeds, fenugreek seeds, fennel, coriander, bay leaves, cinnamon, cloves and cardamom)
recipeInstructions.name: In a large pan, heat the oil at medium heat and add all the whole spices(cumin seeds, fenugreek seeds, fennel, coriander, bay leaves, cinnamon, cloves and cardamom)

recipeInstructions.text: Let them cook on medium heat for 3-4 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Let them cook on medium heat for 3-4 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Add in the chopped onions and mix well. Cook the onions with occasional stirring.
recipeInstructions.name: Add in the chopped onions and mix well. Cook the onions with occasional stirring.

recipeInstructions.text: Add in the dried red chillies, raw cashews and turmeric after 10 minutes and cook for another 5 minutes or until onions turn golden.
recipeInstructions.name: Add in the dried red chillies, raw cashews and turmeric after 10 minutes and cook for another 5 minutes or until onions turn golden.

recipeInstructions.text: Cool this onion cashew mixture and blend with a little water to coarse paste.
recipeInstructions.name: Cool this onion cashew mixture and blend with a little water to coarse paste.

recipeInstructions.text: In the same pan, add a little oil and this mixture. Cook the mixture for 6-7 minutes on medium heat.
recipeInstructions.name: In the same pan, add a little oil and this mixture. Cook the mixture for 6-7 minutes on medium heat.

recipeInstructions.text: Add in all the veggies, ginger garlic paste, salt and sugar.
recipeInstructions.name: Add in all the veggies, ginger garlic paste, salt and sugar.

recipeInstructions.text: Mix well and cook on medium low heat, covered, with occasional stirring.
recipeInstructions.name: Mix well and cook on medium low heat, covered, with occasional stirring.

recipeInstructions.text: Once the veggies are almost cooked, remove from heat.
recipeInstructions.name: Once the veggies are almost cooked, remove from heat.

recipeInstructions.text: Grease a baking dish and layer half inch of rice.
recipeInstructions.name: Grease a baking dish and layer half inch of rice.

recipeInstructions.text: Drop the veggies mixture on top to cover all of the rice with a half inch layer. If here is more veggies mixture left, you can make another rice layer and veggies layer.
recipeInstructions.name: Drop the veggies mixture on top to cover all of the rice with a half inch layer. If here is more veggies mixture left, you can make another rice layer and veggies layer.

recipeInstructions.text: Add a half inch layer of rice.
recipeInstructions.name: Add a half inch layer of rice.

recipeInstructions.text: Garnish the top with chopped tomatoes, cilantro and lemon juice.
recipeInstructions.name: Garnish the top with chopped tomatoes, cilantro and lemon juice.

recipeInstructions.text: Cover dish with foil and bake at 350 degrees F for 15-20 minutes right before serving.
recipeInstructions.name: Cover dish with foil and bake at 350 degrees F for 15-20 minutes right before serving.

keywords: Indian rice dish, vegan rice dish
